dict.acceptation: 尝味；略进（饮食）；（少量地）吃；有某种味道；

sent.orig: Taste: Strong mellow taste, mature a perfect aging additiona liquor taste.
sent.trans: 口感：酒味醇厚有力，经完美陈化后，单宁成熟，酒体丰盈，酒质卓越。

sent.orig: Noxiu ban thin, bright luster, fine quality, rich juice, taste flavor, sweet-sour taste.
sent.trans: 皮薄无锈斑，光泽鲜亮，肉质细密，汁液丰满，味道浓香，甜酸爽口。

sent.orig: Aozhi the Mongolian milk tea, there is no smell of mutton taste, taste good.
sent.trans: 蒙古人熬制的奶茶，没有膻味儿，味道极好。

sent.orig: To know the taste of a pear, have to taste a pear.
sent.trans: 要想知到梨子的滋味，就要亲口尝一尝。

sent.orig: Recommended Reason: The hot taste challenges your taste bud.
sent.trans: 推荐理由：火辣风味挑战你的味蕾。
